S

SecurityComponents - Class in com.pokerface.pokerapi.config
SecurityComponents provides beans required to facilitate security.
SecurityComponents() - Constructor for class com.pokerface.pokerapi.config.SecurityComponents
 
SecurityConfig - Class in com.pokerface.pokerapi.config
The SecurityConfig handles which paths are accessible with any given authentication level, and tells spring security how to authenticate users.
SecurityConfig(UserService, PasswordEncoder) - Constructor for class com.pokerface.pokerapi.config.SecurityConfig
The SecurityConfig depends on the UserService and the PasswordEncoder in order to tell Spring Security how to retrieve users, and how to encode the passwords provided by the client.
